extDesc.message: A minimal extension for biometric device Fingkey Hamster using eNBioBSP SDK and native messaging protocol.

popup_desc.message: Click the buttons to test the extension functionalities

popup_desc2.message: (the extension uses the first detected device by default)

popup_permissionDesc.message: This extension requires explicit permission to run on a website. Click the button below to grant or revoke the permission on this website.

popup_permissionDesc2.message: The page will be refreshed after changing the permission.

background_noDataReceived.message: No data received from native app

background_installPrompt.message: Click to download, then install the NBioBSP Extension Setup
